storage.content: 5 room Resale at Fajar Road. Like what you see? DM us to schedule an appointment with our designer.

There’s still so many angles of my house I haven’t shared with you, that I really need to, and this one here is one of them- ever since we got this new Luka media console from @castleryus this has easily become one of my favorite views. I love how this piece is functional, beautiful and dare I say, a piece of art... I love this new piece and all the beautiful pieces @castleryus carries. Their quality never disappoints, their prices are fair and their customer service is exquisite! I would 10 out of 10 recommend.

Recreated with a Mediterranean sensibility, earthy and olive tones of wood, rattan and linen are predominantly present to induce a chill and homey feeling.  Wouldn't it be nice to view the sunset on a good breezy day from here?
First pic of our home 🏡 swipe for the before pic! Watch this space as we update our home transformation journey~

I’ve been living in Los Angeles, California for about two years coming up and i have now had time to design my dream place. now, watching my favorite shows are going to be held by this beautiful Nigel TV Stand from @castleryus! what tv shows have you been watching? in need of all recommendations and all genres🦋⁣ .⁣ ⁣ yo estado viviendo en Los Ángeles, California por cerca de dos años y ahora he tenido tiempo para diseñar el lugar de mis sueños. ¿Qué programas de televisión has estado viendo? ⁣ —⁣ image description: sitting on the right side of my TV stand with my hair slightly leaning on my television. There are two plants on either side of the father and a picture frame above on the wall with a woman in a yellow gown. I am also wearing a white and yellow dress

Thanks for the love of this nook yesterday on ig stories ❤️ you guys share the kindest cheers! My clients have always wanted a cozy corner in the niche beside their bed and we shaped it up by having a storage sideboard from @castlerysg for all the handbags, drawers for her jewellery and skin care products and a pretty art for viewing pleasure.

👏The results of Castlery's Styling Contest are in! We are pleased to announce the winners who will walk away with a $500 Castlery voucher each. ⠀ ⠀ 🎉Congratulations to @clemmylim for winning the Popular Photo Award, and @jerryosc for winning the Best Photo Award!
Finally settling in to my place 😊 Thank you @castleryus for making it feel like home 🏡

living.content: Thank you to @castleryus for making our new home feel so homey! Huge upgrade from our cat torn up, Berkeley free & for sale couch we had for 3 years. I already feel 10x more hip and trendy :) #ad

The living room makeover is here! It’s finally come together after being on hold for months. We swapped out some furniture and the room feels so much brighter and lighter (Adams sofa is gifted from @castleryus). Head to stories to get more of a behind the scenes look 🏠💖

The biggest thanks to @castleryus for making this house feel even more like home. From coffee in the mornings to slow and quiet evenings, this green sofa is exactly what I need to bring this whole room together. ⁣ ⁣ Couldn’t have dreamt of having a living room that looked like this in years, and here it is! Come over for coffee, sweet friends 🌿🤍⁣
How’s everyone coping with staying at home? For me it’s a good time to start with all those books I’ve been wanting to read 😊
Our apartment is finally starting to feel like a home (!!!) I wanted girly chic, @alexshaywillett wanted boho... and we found the perfect pieces from @castleryus to decorate our living room with

The living room rug saga continues! We got this super pretty, giant persian rug and while we love it on its own we don't know if it's the right fit for this space. I might have to redesign around it to make it work. We are going to live with it for a few days and then decide if we're keeping it here or putting in storage for a future home.

Just thinking about a space we completed last year @seveninstyle Sitting high above the trees and looking out toward the most easterly point of Australia. In collaboration with some inspiring designers @castleryau the sofa has the best view from the house 💙 Beautiful spaces to still enjoy @aperfectstay .

When @benyong_ and I planned the design of our living room, we decided it would be a place of intentionality, that would foster connection and community. So there’s no TV. After moving in over 6 months ago, I’m finally at a place where I’m stoked with the way it’s decorated (and so are my mastiffs, just swipe right…). Extra special shoutout to @castleryau for this couch that suits the space so perfectly. 💛

Before and after : Having an outdoor kitchen was one of the first request my client wanted for her home. They wanted to do daily cooking surrounded by nature and to get fumes out of the home. We reused all the existing appliances that was left behind by the ex home owners as they were still in good conditions. Structural changes were made to the backyard by removing the spiral stairs and extending more floor space. Next, we linked a pop of pattern graphic tile connecting the outdoor kitchen to the side of the home to make the backyard more spacious. By sticking with a cement structure and stainless steel backslash, the outdoor kitchen set up was designed to last through rain or shine. Photos by @joydevi Design and styling #styledbypt Renovation by @cloverspacesg

I get soooo many questions about why my washer/dryer is in my kitchen, but it’s actually a common European approach for small spaces! So I can just pretend that I live in Europe, right? Btw happy Mother’s Day to all the moms out there 💕✨

My happy project 🏠💫 <fun fact> After Accounting and Business Admin, the 3rd course I signed up for across all school applications back during the Univ entrance exam days was Interior Design. So happy to see my vision (slowly but surely) coming to life 😌

Good morning Sunday ☕️ I know it’s June but I finally wrote out some goals for 2019 😂 The busier life gets and the older we become, I feel like you blink and a year passes 💨 So enjoy today, Sunday is a good day to re-group and get your head in order 🖤

Back to quiet morning, clean and tidy living room without toys and puzzles scattered around because new term finally started for the little one! #backtoschool . It’s been half a year since we moved in still pretty much in love with our simple and minimalist inspired home.

The biggest thanks to @castleryus for making this house feel even more like home. From coffee in the mornings to slow and quiet evenings, this green sofa is exactly what I need to bring this whole room together. ⁣ ⁣ Couldn’t have dreamt of having a living room that looked like this in years, and here it is! Come over for coffee, sweet friends 🌿🤍⁣ ⁣ #theharvesthouse #stayathome #safeathome #thisishome

The difference a new couch can make to the entire room is amaaaaazing!!! We are so stoked with our new @castleryau sofa 😍 it’s so beautiful, fabric is sooo soft and best of all it’s actually comfortable! We weren’t happy with our last couches so sent them back in favor of these. I freakin LOVE them! 😍 ⁣.⁣

bedroom.content: 60cm of bedside table width🙌🏻 Loving our new wider bedsides from @castleryau Storage galore and so much space for laptop, mags, headphones, skincare, phone, tea, the odd toy car, books, earrings, hairbands, water, the occasional candle; you know how it is! What are YOUR bedside essentials? See more on my mini bedroom refresh on the blog now, via link in bio. #gifted

Long awaited bed frame is here , thanks @castlerysg !! We’ve been sleeping on the mattress the past few days 😆 right on time as we all stay home to avoid covid! Not forgetting my comfy bedsheets from @sojaoshop
Those old one still drinking 😫 really Beh tahan, sleep first. Good night 😪

the full moon by staying up way past my bedtime having a little tequila & FaceTime with some of my very favorite mystic ladies. sisterhood is so sacred especially when we find those we can be our whole (messy) selves with. aging for me has added another layer to the ways in which my relationships deepen. asking me how can we better share our hearts. our desires, our grievances, our shame, our forgiveness, our challenges and our goals. this may look like a beautiful IG square of linen bedding, crystals and a fabulous new nightstand. all of which I love, yet it’s also a way of visually reminding myself to hold the love for the many layers of me and the life I’m in. appreciation for companies who work with me so I can experience the joy of owning our first set of nightstands that aren’t apple crates and the gratitude that comes from the days long before IG that led me here. #fullmoonmusings #sisterhood

Before and After : The master bedroom was designed to be a zen sanctuary for my clients to unwind and the palette we chose was soft taupe and a touch of dark greys in a few textures for more depth. I am obsessed with S fold curtains and a tip is always to have them installed right up your ceiling so that the illusion of the window and room height is taller.  Photo by @joydevi Design and styling #styledbypt Renovation by @sg.scratch

•MASTER REVAMP• The master bedroom overhaul is finally complete!!! • Look our room probably wasn't in dire straights - but I though a little revamp and upgrade to a king bed couldn't hurt anyone. I had for a long time wanted to upgrade our bed and mattress (it was about seven years old), Nathan was having some back issues so we dove headfirst into researching mattresses and also spoke to a few friends of ours who had upgraded their beds due to similar reasons • The verdict was to get a memory foam mattress, we went with @ecosa_sleep because I really liked their pricing, returns policy and also the fact that you could reconfigure the three layers inside the mattress to adjust the firmness of the mattress over time or according to our needs • The first night was interesting, it was so strange going from a spring mattress to a foam mattress, but after a few nights, we were well and truly use to it. • We have been now sleeping on the Ecosa mattress for about two months and LOVE it!! Nathan doesn't wake up anymore with back pain and my back is feeling so much better! The mattress arrived as a medium/firm configuration and we haven't felt the need to change it • If you are in need of a new mattress I would highly recommend @ecosa_sleep , their customer service was second to none, delivery time was super quick and the quality and comfort of the mattress is incredible!!! • Our bed frame is from @castleryau (the link for the exact frame is below). • They have kindly offered our readers 10% off full priced items when you use the code FAWNANDFINCH from the 14th to the 28th of November. I have been so impressed with this bed frame it was so easy to put together and their customer service and delivery times were second to none!!! • #fawnandfinch

Before and After: The brief for this master bedroom was to keep it as simple as possible. Thus the minimal throw cushion pairings, the clean white sheets and just a touch of brass gold as tiny details.  Photo by@joydevi Design and styling #styledbypt

Before and After : Ceilings in homes these days aren't that high. I used a cheat code by painting a border in the ceiling colour which matches the curtains beam. Despite the dark paint in the room, the extended ceiling illusion allows for the space to feel spacious and higher than it is. The paint used was forged metal from dulux. #tipoftheday

No prizes for guessing where I spend a good bulk of my time on. Besides a comfortable mattress, having a good bed frame definitely adds a lot to comfort (and of course the aesthetics). So glad we went ahead with the Joseph King Bed Frame from @castlerysg. It’s such a classic and timeless looking piece, and is such a commanding piece for a simple bedroom like ours. I also prefer having loose furniture as opposed to built-ins because the space can then evolve with me as my needs changes.  That aside, Castlery has a wide variety of beautiful pieces (we also got our work desks from them) that is sure to fit great in your home! For National day, until 10 August, get $55 off every $800 spent! It’s a great deal you guys won’t wanna miss out!
Will be hard checking out of this room for sure! Loving the warm wood and monochrome styling here 🤍🖤 ​

dining.content: I grew up with my aunt’s big family and every meal time, me and my cousins would gather around the table, eat (or sometimes fight for more food 😅), and talk about so many things. Some meals were longer than others because we would just keep chatting — the things that happened during our younger years, the ghosts and evil spirit stories, what happened in school, and just so many random things. When I look back on all those moments, I realize how those conversations kept us all closer and our communication better.  So when Johnrick and I moved into our new home, it’s no surprise that our dining table from @castleryus was our very first furniture. We would always sleep on the floor but we made sure that every meal was shared on our table. It became our spot to share how our day at work went, while eating dinner. On our days off, it’s where we would eat breakfast or brunch while planning our next home project or which home goods store we’re going to next. You can probably say it’s one of the most important parts of the house for me. That’s why I picked a dining table that will last us forever! For the longest time I was torn between a wooden table or a marble one. But I’m pretty clumsy so I needed one that won’t easily show signs of wear and tear. So happy we went with the Chelsea Marble table!  Swipe for some of our meals as well as before and after photos! Also, check out my stories for a quick video on how we styled the dining area as well as the link to our dining table and other products. #castleryus

First look into my new home. I envisioned my space to be a mix of textures and shapes, effortlessly tying together modern minimalism and 60’s design. More on my stories Dining table and Sand Tableware: @castleryau
Surrounded by plants, book in one hand coffee in the other. Good morning 🌅  This table + bench dining set from @castleryus is my morning spot every day

We have been re-doing our apartment little by little to make it feel more like home (or as Brook says, I’m just playing real-life Animal Crossings) and the video just went live of our dining room redo! Absolutely obsessed with this new set from @castleryus 😍 IT MAKES ME SO HAPPY!
Winning at life today. House clean, ready for a new week ahead. . New rug lovin from @missamaraloves😍 . Light & table @castleryau and chairs @skdesignerliving

I’ve teased you guys long enough🖤The new dining chairs are here!!  We are IN LOVE- our last ones left big shoes to fill lol but these @castleryus have done the job! I have a thing for chairs.. it’s like the one piece of furniture I just collect because they’re just so fun and unique! Do you guys collect any furniture ??

#Kohlynhome Dining area — @jaydenjayjay and I host quite a bit and thus we knew we needed a sizable dining area. ⁣ ⁣We bought a 5-year-old 3-room flat and knocked down one of the rooms to make way for a larger dining area. With that, we can fit a 2.1m dining table comfortably. ⁣ ⁣ The position of the table can then be changed according to the number of people we host. So far, we were able to host around 20 people.⁣ ⁣ This house was designed on our own. We engaged a contractor to help us with all the works required. I’ll post more about the home in the coming days! #jacqcreates

Silver Lining: we now get to sit down (I use the word “sit” very loosely) as a family and eat dinner together at the same time. Today we celebrate Malik turning 5 months old. What is your silver lining?  Table and Chairs by @castleryau (and getting some solid KM’s at the moment)
My temporary WFH situation while we fixing up our study room. #stayhomewithcastlery

New home, new adventure, new memories. I would say this journey was a long one, and jaded one but definitely one worth the struggles, and I’m thankful to my family and @thehustlerr__ , for being there in every way 🤍  Finally, a safe haven for the two of us. A house tour maybe? . 👩🏻‍🤝‍👨🏼: @thehustlerr__ . 👷🏻‍♂️: @thelocalinnterior . 🛋 & dining : @castlerysg

LET’S PLAY!!! If you could have any 3 people over for dinner, dead or alive, real or fiction, who would it be? ❤️💙❤️ This answer changes for me depending on my life situation and emotional state at the time 😂 But right now, I don’t care who it is, I’m just happy we can eat at a dining table and not on the couche... which we’ve been doing for 3 months 🤦🏻‍♀️ But seriously, I love this table - a marble top, timber legs and brass accents, well worth waiting to find the right one! 🙌🏼 Well done @castleryau 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼 NOW, who are your 3 guests?
Cooking with a view 🌿 Beautiful home recently staged by us 💁🏻‍♀️💁🏻‍♀️

other.content: Obsessed with our new mirror from @castleryau. 😍⁠ I originally placed it beside our bed, but I was experimenting (much to @benyong_'s dismay) and I styled it in our study nook (see next slide)...⁠ I don't know which place I like it better! Can you help me decide? 😅
Happiness is.. Waking up on whim and having breakfast in PJs at our fav spot right here ❤

Cheers to the weekend and my new mirror from @castleryau. This ‘Edward Standing Mirror’ is seriously a show-stopper. The brass frame adds such an elegance to our bedroom, and the ribbed glass detail is so pretty and unique ✨ It’s so exciting watching our main bedroom come together! Love everything from @castleryau and thank you again for our gorgeous mirror! 👏🏻 #livewithelle #castleryau
i love my lil purple mood 💜

Finally having a power point installed behind this baby so we can turn it on! 🙌 I get so many questions about this mantle (because we also have one in our bedeoom) so I thought I'd answer them here. It's a faux fire and plugs into the wall since it's electric. We have ducted cooling and heating so we don't use it as a heat source and therefore can't comment on its consumption. You can just turn on the light for ambience or you can have it on a heat setting which compares to a hairdryer. They're about $600 from modaliving and I'm pretty sure that was including delivery. Hope that answers all your questions. Drop some below if I've missed something so I can refer people to this thread when they ask ❤😚

The sunlight and windowscape from the master vanity /walk in wardrobe is perfect for the mood we wanted for a relaxing place to get dressed and ready. With the darker walls, we added some jazz with some cool brass gold finds and paired them with my client existing rocking chair and rug to complete the look.  Photo by @joydevi Design and styling #styledbypt Renovation by @sg.scratch
Dining room detail shot for The Marshall’s interior project @homebeautiful // Photographer @chriswarnes

simple yet gorgeous seating thanks to @castleryus. these luxe leather poufs are lightweight to move anywhere yet firm enough for anyone to sit down or kick their feet up. simple decor thanks to my tree collecting self 🎄🙋🏻‍♀️. I do love the beautiful garlands on mantles filling my feed so perhaps this will change yet today this is it.

Before and After : My dream poufs sitting really pretty in this living room where the kids can crawl and twirl and sleep all over safe and sound. Photo by @joydevi Design and styling #styledbypt Renovation by @cloverspacesg

It was Martha who said she prefers decorating with mirrors more than art, right? Same, so much same. This Space Standing Mirror from @castleryus (gifted) not only satisfies my itch to have an arch in the home, it's also great for checking my teeth after lunch and checking in on my posture that degrades the longer I sit here to work 🥴 While the mirror has nothing to do with helping my productivity, it's my favorite decorative detail in the office.
Dressing room & my new favourite mirror. #ChiLingLoft
